author: mojubare
title: The Great Magicians Magic; Script 8
body:
"after a good meal, one should use such good and healthy palm wine to wash down the food," forjan said . he looked at hali and saw that the boy was reluctant to drink. "a cup won't harm you, just drink and that will be enough for one day so that you will still remain in check."

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn-pro.elsalvador.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/07030819/1465484281202.jpg


hali drank the wine. it tasted sweet and very good in his mouth. palm wine generally tasted sweet and very good in hali's mouth that was why he loved it so much. he gulped down the entire content in the cup. forjan smiled to himself. he kew that within few moments, hali would crave for more; the fact that he had tasted the palm wine meant that his appetite for alcoholism had been whetted.
root_title: The Great Magicians Magic; Script 8

author: mojubare
title: The Mind-Set of an Entrepreneur
body:
If there is one thing that stops people from moving into what they have always loved to do, it is the regular excuse associated with lack of funds to get into the journey of starting their own business, I have brought good news with this post: As important as money is in the business industry, you do not need a lot of it, before you begin your business journey.  The moment you decide to become a business owner, you also have to literarily move away from the passenger’s seat to the driver’s seat. 


![20190531175936-GettyImages-1004398522.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmaS8QAxUUiE5S1J5p5eQNv8zb5F2niGf9nGHthkZUfvxY/20190531175936-GettyImages-1004398522.jpeg)
[Source](entrepreneur.com)


It takes more than money to become a business owner and to build wealth, consider those who make so much money from bet sites, but get back to the level of poverty after some months, this makes it very clear that money is not all that is needed to make wealth and achieve greatness. More than money, a willing heart to ach

author: mojubare
title: The Warren Buffett Business and Investment Documentary - (A post for every Investor)
body:
If you are an investor or a prospective investor in the stock market and business, then Warren Buffett should not need an introduction to you. Unlike Bill Gates, Jeff Bezos and Mark who made money by innovation or like Jim and Alice Walton who inherited money, Warren Buffet made his wealth from winning in the stock market for over half a century.


![12682081033_1f351d28d1_c.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQjNxHjzJK9iSMLxZFioH6UN9fYWmjDnNvZU2hbpyb6kJ/12682081033_1f351d28d1_c.jpg)
 [Source](https://www.flickr.com/photos/donkeyhotey/12682081033)

Born in Omaha in the year 1930 when the great depression was telling on everyone, into the family of a stock broker Howard Buffett. Buffett started investing in shares from before graduating from high school which you might say is expected of a stock broker’s son but this time, his father was into politics and a congress man. He bought 3 stocks of Cities Service Company. He bought Coca-Cola in packs at wholesale prices and sell them to his fellow students at a r
root_title: The Warren Buffett Business and Investment Documentary - (A post for every Investor)

body:
The process of raising money for a new business is one of the reasons why a lot of great business idea owners fail to start anything at all, raising funds for a new business is not easy, it is a great task of convincing people to go in for something they do not know what the outcome will be. author: mojubare
title: Overcoming the habit of a stressful entrepreneurial life
body:
Entrepreneurs have a usual habit of working themselves so hard and breaking out at the end of the day, do you know that even during the moments of being completely tired and exhausted some entrepreneurs always try to get busy and that is one basic reason behind not being productive. The truth is, there is a difference between just working and being productive, when you are productive means you are working to get result but at a tired and exhausted state, you may not be able to work to produce any beneficial result any longer.


With lots of blogs telling us about how much sacrifices are to be made by entrepreneurs, some new entrepreneurs just belief they have to kill themselves with work but I will like to remind you that there is a limit to the power of coffee and energy drinks.


![20150908164448-panic-stress-business-man-working.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWtvby114MdcWBqrYDwXW9B6HaRa74M5kEo3vAA1bc1ZB/20150908164448-panic-stress-business-man-working.jpeg)

author: mojubare
title: Will Electric Vehicles become a Reality
body:
A lot of vehicle from cars, bike, planes, and ships are becoming automated and run on electricity. Companies like Tesla, Mercedes, Uber are doing their best to get hold of electric cars and make fossil fuel become obsolete but can this be the case?

It is true that there are about 1/10 of cars which runs on electricity, I have been seeing service point and car charging spots in news and documentaries abroad but I haven’t seen any in my country. Countries like China, United States and the Europe have been improving on electric car sales and production in the last 5 years but what about the remaining part of the world? Companies like Tesla, Beijing Electric vehicles, and Nissan are building a lot of electric cars but this cars are promoted to the west and East but not to all part of the world.


![battery_in_the_cloud_3_300dpi.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmda3BMuWDQMdkNeEajBCPqR3JFDhiuWZ51WBvZE3hWq5s/battery_in_the_cloud_3_300dpi.jpg)

root_title: Will Electric Vehicles become a Reality

author: mojubare
title: Huawei - The Growth, Controversies and Future for the Tech Giant
body:
A lot of never knew China were into a lot of technology and in the mobile industry until we came across Huawei. Huawei has proven to be a tech company that has been able to compete with Samsung and Apple, also it has created a lot of controversies in big nations like the United States as it looked like a threat to home tech giants as well as since the Chinese government has a level of power over companies, they could use it to spy on individuals and this has raised a lot of geopolitical rancor. Huawei product and tech is being used in over 170 countries around the world.

author: mojubare
title: The best way to handle a difficult boss
body:
I have meet with people who have worked in different companies and they always have a complain to make about their boss, this usually results in a frustrated work experience because they never feel that any boss that they work with is good enough and that gives them a consistent reason to change their jobs from time to time. I would agree also that some bosses are extremely difficult to work with and such people make it extremely frustrating to have a sound work experience but instead of changing jobs regularly, you can also do some work on yourself and see the way things turn out.

The first and most important key to stay with a boss is trying to connect with your boss, some bosses appear difficult because they are going through so much trying to keep the business in good shape but connecting with your boss will help you understand what the business needs to grow and survive and also what you need to do to grow the business.

https://tjn-blog-images.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/07160917/diffe
root_title: The best way to handle a difficult boss

author: mojubare
title: Does Hard work Make People Rich and Successful?
body:
have you attended some business seminars or read a few books where you  are told that in other to be rich, you just have to work really hard, take risk and be persistent, you would be successful but are this things true? Why do hard work not always provide wealthy people all the time, and is it possible to work your way to prosperity? Well, i have seen a few of people who are successful and they attribute it to hard work, and i have seen a vast majority of people who are very hard working but do not have what to show financially as a proof of hard work.

https://miro.medium.com/max/1200/1*IQGC-au1gyKT1vFEIhtEVg.jpeg
[source](https://images.app.goo.gl/KYEe8eqhnKYUaMvC9)


#### What is the Chance of everyone in the world becoming the next Warren Buffet or Bill Gates? 0.00001% 

The fact that a certain number of people work hard and become wealthy doesn't mean everyone who works hard make it. The fact that a school drop out gamer got into gaming and commentating on social media and earned more money than gradua
root_title: Does Hard work Make People Rich and Successful?

title: Smart and Successful Decisions to make as we Enter into a New Year.
body:
As the new year gets closer to us and a good number of us are setting plans and goals for the new year, I thought it was important to write this down here, I learnt it as well and since it is resourceful and helpful to me, it is only good that I also share it with colleagues here who are as desirous of success as I am. It has become a constant habit for people to write down their desires for a new year and they do this at the end of every year but at the end of the year, those goals are not accomplished at all.

title: Let Your Resolution be Real
body:

Yes, you just did the resolution thing so as to be relevant and be able to brag to others. Every early January, people are always write resolutions and most of the resolutions are fake.

Is it possible that you start a new year as a new person every year? Well, it is visible that we do not know what we want. We do not know if we should pick the A or the Z of life. So many people go as far as googling what to do in the new year. 


Your new year resolution should be a personal thing and not what

title: Effective Speech (Focus on the Topic)
body:
Every Speech is a speech, either a raise your glass speech, a school project speech, a seminar speech, conference or any other speech. Every speech requires preparation especially those that have to do with the success of a project, business or any other productive thing.

 A lot of people have given awful speeches and they felt really bad after the speech as a result of the negative feedback they got. Nobody loves doing things the wrong way and so it isn't their fault that they performed bad but we could improve on our skills which will help improve how we give speeches.

https://greatspeech.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/signs-of-stuttering-kings-speech.jpg
[source](https://images.app.goo.gl/Tks6toT5UC8aDqWd7)

When giving speeches, there are a few things to consider and one of them is focus. With focus, no matter the amount of words surrounding a topic, you are obligated to choose which body is important for your audience and which isn't. 

You can tell them everything in one meeting or event, you are to
root_title: Effective Speech (Focus on the Topic)

author: mojubare
title: Planning for retirement- careful considerations to be made.
body:
Retirement is an extremely delicate age and if care is not taken it may be the age of hunger and starvation for some and at the same time for some other set of people it is the age of complete relaxation and fun, it all boils down to how prepared we are before the age of retirement. 

>The way you lay your bed is the way you will lie on it.

There is no perfect age for retirement just as there is also no perfect time for retirement. 

The quote above is an absolutely perfect description for retirement, at a young age when we have the total strength and muscle to work, we have to start preparing for what the age of retirement will look like. Planning is extremely important and a young age is the best time to begin planning for the time when we are going to retire.


![images - 2021-02-23T194208.302.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVnm9ot2HFQa9gJCdFAKaZeoNDdRLpvtuBNbKjXyDRdnv/images%20-%202021-02-23T194208.302.jpeg)

root_title: Planning for retirement- careful considerations to be made.

title: The importance of having an healthy mind and how to get it.
body:
A healthy mind is of course a happy entrepreneur and a worker that will contribute more to the success of the company. Everyone wants to patronize an entrepreneur who looks healthy and smart and in order for this to happen, it means that every entrepreneur needs to be able to work on keeping their mind healthy.

The mind is an extremely strong irresistible factor of life, the mind has the ability to make anyone become either poor or rich and the power of the mind lies very much in how well we are able to make use of it. 

As much as we love to maintain a physical body, maintaining a healthy mind as well serves a very great purpose to our lives, the mind that is healthy is a mind that will be able to conceive and achieve better results. As great as it is to keep the mind healthy, it is actually very easy to keep the mind healthy.

![images - 2021-03-02T233215.126.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRS8sgXVtpkmYBL55XURCEQrvaAAkSzNzq4oyWHHUxr56/images%20-%202021-03-02T233215.126.jpeg)

title: Life plays out on the law of attraction, build up yourself all the time.
body:
As the very busy entrepreneur that you are, you might be busy trying to fix everything around your business place and you get very little time to fix yourself. You might be busy trying all your best to ensure that your workers are on their toes and you do not realize how much it is that you need to work on fixing yourself a little bit more.

The things that you get in life simply works based on the law of attraction, the things that we get to ourselves is often as a result of how we have built ourselves to be. We are a complete result of the things that we are able to attract to ourselves and the level of accomplishment that we have been able to get is as a result of the way we have built up ourselves to be.

title: HOW TO BECOME STRONGER MENTALLY.
body:
Mental strength is often overlooked simply because it does not add anything to the physical body but as much as it is important to take care of the physical, mental health must also not be placed aside.

body:

title: Legal requirements for small business owners.
body:
Starting a business definitely needs that a lot of things has to be done and with so much work on the table, it is almost expected that the legal structure is pushed aside and unattended to but this usually ignored topic hunts down a lot of businesses and eventually results in them getting crumbled. 

Having a business lawyer is really good for a business because the business is prevented from falling into serious problems, the lawyer who has a clear understanding of the things that are at stake, will be able to explain properly what the firm needs in order to avoid legal problems, instead of running around looking for a lawyer whenever there is a problem, it is better and more cost effective to get one in the team.

author: mojubare
title: FACTS ABOUT THE OPERATIONS OF THE BANK.
body:
We have gone pass the ages of keeping money in our homes or having a closet filled with cash, even little children now have bank accounts and with the great number of people opening bank accounts every day, the bank is becoming a place for both the rich and the poor, as more people are using the bank more financial institutions are coming up every day and these financial institutions are making money massively. Before you choose the bank as a place to safe keep your money, I think I should let you know some of this facts.

### Your money saved at the bank is not safe from inflation.

Inflation is not a friend to the growth of our money and irrespective of the profit range promised on the money you have at the bank, it will not be safe guarded by the high rate of inflation. The rate of inflation every year is greater than what we have as the profit rate that the bank promised us, the rate of inflation is really high and gets higher all the time. The money you have saved at the bank for a particular purpose wi
root_title: FACTS ABOUT THE OPERATIONS OF THE BANK.

author: mojubare
title: The power of the mind: Make strong decisions today because it determines the future.
body:
The mind holds a very strong position in our lives that it virtually controls everything about us, the things that we consume, the why that we choose to present ourselves says a lot about what becomes of us eventually. Life comes with troubles most times but it takes a strong and disciplined mind to overlook every of those troubles and issues of life and then develop a strong positive energy to overcome the hurdles of life.

Taking advice from people is surely normal but knowing which advice to put into good use makes a significant difference, processing thoughts and then leaving with a conclusion to only do the thing that you want to do and not what others want you to do is a very strong process of the mind, trying to follow the advice from everyone does nothing but leaves us as a confused entity.

author: mojubare
title: Increased Income isn't a Guarantee to Wealth.
body:
I was having a conversation with my very blunt friend and I was lamenting so much about how my life will improve if I am able to make more money, I just thought that life will be much more pleasant the moment I begin to make more money and as such I was seriously looking for the ways I could increase my income streams when he looked at me straight in the eye and said, it is never about how much you make but how well you are able to utilize the amount you have made.

The statement got me thinking and I had a deep reflection about how things in my environment are, I figured out that some category of young men were obviously making a lot of money and they were just spending as much as they made as well, then I wondered what will happen if there is a halt to the stream of income they had at the moment it will seriously affect their way of life.


![download (33).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWHbdDjQNZbprSKy94kHvMhy8KPgFU62HeeQSxHW3dUUc/download%20(33).jpeg)

[Source](https://sevenpillarsinstitute.org/ca
root_title: Increased Income isn't a Guarantee to Wealth.

author: mojubare
title: Limiting traits resulting in retarded progress.
body:
#### Always feeling inferior.

Do you have that classmate who always feel intimidated and withdrawn from every other person, that classmate who often gets bullied by other big boys in the class, I am certain that a lot of people will not want to become friends with someone who is like that, apart from school when such person gets into the social world if that same character is maintained, the person might not be able to mix and relate well with others in the social world or may even have slow growth also.


![brown-snail-climbing-pile-coins-260nw-557653234.webp](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPvb2hbq7s6cTcq9UrT6xSqt8q37EU8fzHArMUrmdyFWV/brown-snail-climbing-pile-coins-260nw-557653234.webp)

[shutterstock](https://www.shutterstock.com/search/slow+growth)

#### Feeling too bad about a failed attempt for a long time.

When we try something and fail it continues to play in our sub-conscious mind for a very long time thereby creating in us the fear to try anything else. Failure is sometimes bound to happen but
root_title: Limiting traits resulting in retarded progress.

title: Spread a little act of kindness, it makes the world better.
body:
We are all busy trying to make money that we completely forget about how the world needs our little contribution to make it better, we might never get to a level of satisfaction in life especially when it has to do with financial strength. 

Contributing to a reputable charity organization is an exclusively good way to make the world better in the way that we can. There are charity organizations who need help and the little contributions we make often makes a significant difference in their lives, no matter how little it is make it a habit to make little contributions from your earnings to charity organizations.

author: mojubare
title: SECRETS THAT WILL HELP YOU INCREASE YOUR INCOME.
body:
##### Have more reasons to succeed.
Success is mostly hindered by the excuses we give not to achieve anything worthwhile, we love to give excuses about the reason why we may not be able to achieve success but the moment we learn to replace those excuses with reasons, we will notice a significant turnaround in our lives. Have something positive that drives you more to make more money, it could be to provide a better life for your family amongst other things but the secret is to have more reasons to drive you to the accomplishment of your dreams.

##### Put in more energy to work.
Now that you have reasons why you want to achieve more success, which is a good thing but being able to put in sufficient amount of energy in order to make that goal become a reality is another thing that needs to be worked upon. The mere reasons/ desire towards success will not bring any significant growth to your income level but the level of dedication that we put in makes a total difference.


![images - 2021-02-25T012227.191.jpe
root_title: SECRETS THAT WILL HELP YOU INCREASE YOUR INCOME.

title: Which Came First; The Chicken or The Chicken-Egg
body:
I was discussing with someone and she asked me categorically, which came first; the Chicken or the Chicken-Egg. This question is logical and also has to do a little with science but if I were to anser this as plain as it is, the Egg should be the first to come as the Egg would always precede the chick.

https://clockwise.software/img/blog/solve-the-chicken-and-egg-problem/header-background.png
[Image source](https://images.app.goo.gl/E1JRZ4nqVphqm3fK6)


Do you know that crossing two different animals of the same genus could give another animal of different specie. Crossing a Horse (*E.f. caballus*) and a Donkey (*E.africanus*), it could produce a Mule.   Was it not possible that there was a cross between two bird of different species only to produce the chicken egg which became the chick. 

https://signlanguageco.com/temp/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/chicken-egg.jpg
[Image source](https://images.app.goo.gl/c8qfQbVipvaERvJA9)

Also, another way to see it is mutation. there is a possibility that the chicken cam
root_title: Which Came First; The Chicken or The Chicken-Egg

title: Trader Joe's Cheap Sales and Brand
body:
Trader Joe's, most times referred to as the Embassy of California, is a store that is different from a lot of supermarkets, stores and shops. It hold no sales, no loyalty program, no self checking,  no coupon, no advertising, and virtually nothing that makes it have a hedge.

Trader Joe's is a grocery store that sells groceries needed by shoppers on a daily bases but what makes it different is its low lost for its products. The store is designed to look like the grocery store Disney land which would always catch the eye of customers. title: Microsoft Saving Apple, its' Competitor
body:
In the 21st century, there have been a lot of rivalry between several companies and their products but one of the oldest is that of Apple and Microsoft with the Mac OS and the Windows OS rivalry. This two companies have been competitors over the system and OS products, in fact, in the tech industry, the two companies are doing really well and are very strong contenders to one another. Both Apple and Microsoft are companies valued above $1T  but would Apple still be existing if not for the intervention of Microsoft's Bill Gates, and why will Bill help a rival survive?

title: WEALTH CREATION, A DEFINITE PATH OF LIVING A BETTER LIFE.
body:
Religious bodies have made money look as if it is evil and must not be mentioned by those who want to make a good name in the afterlife, it is with money that we can achieve anything important, it is with money that we are able to give orders and purchase whatever we want. It is easy for us to decide on not being concerned about money when we have it but it is really difficult for us not to think about money when we do not have it.


![images - 2021-01-22T175048.396.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYikbiPd3Ywtgpxsk1TbsPoDm666D9WTUeAXpb48qZSew/images%20-%202021-01-22T175048.396.jpeg)

[image source](https://www.lifeoptimizer.org/2015/03/24/how-to-build-wealth/)

The health care facilities, the good roads, the good schools, the beautiful buildings and every other luxurious thing we see is as a result of the availability of money, it is when we have money that we can relax and not get bothered about money any longer. 

Some spiritual people run away from getting money because they believe that money is go

author: mojubare
title: Business Issues: Solving The Problem You Have With Your Employees.
body:
As an employer there are so many things that may be running through your mind and getting workers act towards you in a disrespectful manner is a thing you would not like at all. What could make the people you employ begin to regard you in a disrespectful way is what we are going to find out in this educating post, I hope you find it educating.

For one, employees may begin to act disrespectfully towards employers because they consider them immature to handle the office and this may not be the fault of the leader but the fault of the employee who is just naturally disrespectful. If the employee will have any reason to stay, the leader must not create grounds where he is going to get disrespected or insulted, he must also not be too strict on the employees but on all grounds he must be firm and take business matters in a highly disciplined way.


![converse-blog-7.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmSxUtKwKeordqripSG23SvAH2J7xSRYR4wM4Px6ZEgSsi/converse-blog-7.jpg)

body:
Entrepreneurs are known to be very busy people some of them are so busy that they do not even get the time to take care of their bodies and metal health and when such a person gets into a relationship where attention is required it becomes highly difficult to get things balanced. However, there are certain successful entrepreneurs who have been able to make it to the top and they have equally maintained a great family relationship, how did they managed to do it is something I am very concerned about and if you are as concerned as I am, then you should join me as we continue to unravel the act of being a committed entrepreneur and a good family person.

title: Things to do before making your first investment.
body:
Investing is a very important topic and it is a very sure way to help you grow your wealth, making investment is a very good practice and I believe that it is highly disciplined people who are always able to make necessary sacrifices that could result to the accumulation of wealth. Just before you jump right on that investment track, it is important for you to follow the steps and guidelines below.


![images - 2021-01-02T143147.487.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWjPGCC7z5b87ADcfBBbvxNvNoqe91HmLoHKf6yshqgLC/images%20-%202021-01-02T143147.487.jpeg)

It may be a very interesting thing to begin investment but we cannot eliminate the aspect of anything occurring at any point in our lives. title: The economic effect of the coronavirus pandemic raging harder than the great recession.
body:
The world has experienced several reasons to have economic down turn in the past but unlike others coronavirus pandemic appears to hit the human race differently and even strongly, it is the first of its kind and it is doing a lot of damage to the economy also. The disruption caused by the virus is getting out of hand as there might be another wave of complete lockdown which is not in any way healthy for a recovering economy at this point.

title: How you can manage your money during the festive period.
body:
This is a highly festive month and it is almost usual to watch people work very hard in order for them to have something to show off at the end of the year to friends and families, what amuses me the more is the fact that a lot of this showing off attitude is a matter of debt and in no time after the festive period is over, people will begin to roll in debt, while a very large percentage of people will not have any other money to sustain their lifestyle after that. 

The pressure of Christmas is here again and no matter how broke you are, it is a time when everything around you puts pressure on you to buy gift for everyone, your family members and everyone around you are giving out gifts and you are also receiving gifts as well, so no matter how much financial goals you have to meet, Christmas seasons always have these exemptions.

![images - 2020-12-13T214203.838.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmeZJ5jJ5N7fpZbSxgyW1ZTEgfPbbU4cYVN994w6ePuh8j/images%20-%202020-12-13T214203.838.jpeg)

title: Stating a Business with no Funds
body:
https://newsofnigeria.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/business-start-up.jpg
[source](https://images.app.goo.gl/WV6y7fK2dfZ9izeU9)
Starting a business with funds is easier compared to starting one without access to capital. It is true that capital makes it easy to start a business but at the same time, not having capital should not be a hinderance to starting a business, there are only a few things to do and then your business is good to go.

The first thing in every business is not capital but the right business idea. If you do not have capital, it is advisable to invest in your skill, Build on your expertise and build on your knowledge. Make sure you know what you are doing very well, becauee businesses built on skills are often reputsation related. When you do good in your skill business, you get more referrals by people but when the first deal is bad, then all other deal might slip through your palm.

Be sure to have a long list of contacts, your business is starting with no capital and if you do not have

title: Bitcoin Rise is a Product of Safe Haven Search
body:
Everyone have been wondering why Bitcoin is suddenly increasing in value towards this period of the year as it started the year at about $3k and was revolving around the $5k benchmark at the middle of the year.

author: mojubare
title: The clearly differentiated regular habit between the rich and the poor.
body:
Either we admit it or not, humans can only be classified as either being wealthy, poor or middle classed and gradually as inflation hits various sectors of the world it appears that the position for middle classed people is gradually going into extinction and it is either you are wealthy or poor.

I am not going to dispute the fact that somethings happen by fate but most of the time it requires a deliberate effort to either make wealth or remain poor, there are certain activities that are common to the poor and there are other activities that are common to the rich, this undeniable act is what constantly makes the difference between the rich and the poor.

author: mojubare
title: Intentional Problem Solving, The Difference between Entrepreneurs and Employees
body:
What differentiates an entrepreneur from an employee? This is one question I got from a high school student and I decided to give a simple response “Problem”. She wondered for a while and then I explained to her what I meant and in this post I will be explaining what differentiates an entrepreneur from an employee.



![getty_494278234_175211.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmY6W8dhzMUP4FcVRKnyU4yUxuRcP8qZNjViwkGykqPQYf/getty_494278234_175211.jpg)
[Credit](https://www.inc.com/james-paine/entrepreneurs-here-is-how-you-can-find-problems-to-solve.html)

Asides from having access to funds, being an employer and being a risk taker, one thing that differentiate an entrepreneur from an employee is problem solving. As children, we were thought never to get into trouble or cause any problem for people around us or for ourselves. We were not allowed to get into problems and find a solution to the problems because they want us to be safe and this trait grows up with a lot of adults as they do not want to get into a
root_title: Intentional Problem Solving, The Difference between Entrepreneurs and Employees

title: The Business of Philanthropy
body:
Philanthropy is the giving of aids and assistance to people who are in need, and as we know, there are reasons why people business is done to make profit but when it comes to philanthropy, profit isn’t the major aim (some people make profit out of it but it is wrong), so that it why it is a non-profit business or organization. Philanthropy is often focused on causes like solving the homelessness problem, hunger, education, health and other humanitarian purposes but like I said, a lot of people often have a reason for doing the business of philanthropy which is to make profit directly and/or indirectly and this is where it becomes a thing of concern. It is no news that a lot of charitable courses are not transparent.

author: mojubare
title: Is Retiring a Good Idea in This Generation?
body:
True, I want to leave my wealth to my children and I expect them to grow it and be more prosperous than I am. This were almost the same words my grandparent said to my father and this words are similar to what my father said. If I remember clearly, my grandfather retired when he was about 70 years of age, and didn’t really have anything to pass down to his child as inheritance. Well, wealth isn’t an easy thing to gather, all said, in this post, I am not talking about gathering wealth, I will be looking at why a lot of people will not be retiring anytime soon.

![20677.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZmBCpCMvJo3A79oDMQ1nXjhFor1LK5mHxm6KhTb7K21v/20677.jpg)
[Source](https://www.kiplinger.com/article/retirement/t047-c032-s014-5-things-you-need-to-know-before-you-retire.html?amp)



My grandfather would tell me that while he was growing up, he could spend a dollar for days as it was really a huge sum of money but things have changed now as the funds that were enough to handle basic needs are not even enough
root_title: Is Retiring a Good Idea in This Generation?

author: mojubare
title: THE IMPORTANCE OF FINANCIAL LITERACY AND THE WAY TO GET IT
body:
Gaining educational literacy is an evident desire in this present age and time but we often disregard financial literacy which needs to be taken with great importance. Financial literacy is a great necessity that needs to be taken with high importance, financial literacy provides us with the needed confidence and skill required to live a better financial life.

Financial literacy changes our mentality about money, the regular mentality about finance is that money is scarce but financial literacy makes us see things in a brighter light, the truth that financial education exposes us to about money is that money is only scarce to those who do not know how to get it but money is not scarce to those who have the right skill and have positioned themselves in a place where that skill is expected.


![students_financial_literacy-1552524582.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdgGFMWyaW6c8uhFJCtCiVX4jwkgzsVUyzvG5ezsDXptV/students_financial_literacy-1552524582.jpg)

author: mojubare
title: Investing like the Rich (The Too Much Money Problem)
body:
You see, take it or leave it, there are two money problems in our financial lives and these problems are the lack of money and too much money. These problems are experienced by different people on a daily bases, as some people have to deal with the problem of not having money while other have to deal with the problem of where to put their money. A lot of people who have to deal with the no money problem are people in the low and middle class. These class of people are those who get into a lot of debt and while people in the middle class are able to find their ways around their debt, a lot of people in the low income class get into a lot of debt that their net worth is in negative figures thanks to high interest rates of credit cards, home mortgage that they could not afford and other types of debt.


![13-034151-unconventional_investments_that_can_make_you_rich.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNmb54YUsFvvQUgWoTNeipTNWzuHKYfrgf6U5YrqptG12/13-034151-unconventional_investments_that_can_make_you_rich.jpg)

author: mojubare
title: Everyone Pays Tax both the Employer and the Employee
body:
Wages are payment made by employers to employees for work done over a period of time, but while these wages are paid, there is always a reduction in the wages of the employee and this is called tax. Taxes are levy removed by the payer of wages for the government. The certain percentage can be federal taxes, state taxes and local government income taxes, which would be used by the government to fund public projects and pay for the salaries of people in public offices.


![44968867_m.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXLVfhvFWX52ztwQJjU5JnDDGEBVG5c4ThMdFVY2pKqsa/44968867_m.jpg)
[Credit](https://www.businessnhmagazine.com/article/nh-named-a-most-tax-friendly-state)


Most times, employees assume that their employers are not paying taxes and so they are being ripped off by their employers but this is not true as both employers and employees pay taxes. The taxes are based on the status filed in the tax form, so the percentage is taxed differently. As an employee, the taxes removed from wages is determined by t

title: Is Amazon a Monopoly or not in its industry?
body:
There is one name in the mouth of US citizens when it comes to retail and that’s Amazon. Amazon is no longer a United America only store, it is now a worldwide conglomerate with investments in the food industry (Whole Foods), Online Streaming, Gaming, Artificial Intelligence, Robotics, and Data Analytics and so on. You can say really well that Jeff Bezos is really an entrepreneur.

title: THE PSYCHOLOGY BEHIND SAVING MORE
body:
In order for motivation to occur, it means there is a drive to do something out of the ordinary, a person who is simply living a normal usual life will not need to be motivated because he does not have the desire to do anything extra he just wants to go with the day as they come probably sip a few soda and watch movies all day then life is good. The need for motivation comes for a person who has been trying to live a different type of life and who has been struggling to get to the height of achievement and the same thing applies to savings, when it comes to savings, it is important to groom ourselves to save more whilst we understand the tricks associated with the ability to save more, bridging the gap and saving more has a lot to do with our ability to motivate ourselves regularly.


![money-saving-spending-habits-psychology-1068x713.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRLv92M6zE1xPi53DXVfNVHJQULoUpb4sXKqUjBL9b9ZM/money-saving-spending-habits-psychology-1068x713.jpg)
[Source](https://www.moneycrashers.com/
root_title: THE PSYCHOLOGY BEHIND SAVING MORE

title: Investments That Don't Cover for Inflation
body:
Investing is one thing a lot of people preach and some people even sell the idea of investing to the regular average earning people and when we hear this things, we are willing to put in every of our funds into investment programs which we aren’t certain about but rather hope that we make profit. Investing is the act of putting money, time and/or effort into a thing, commodity, or business with the aim of getting profit. The aim of investing is making profit so when profit isn’t made, it becomes a bad investment. title: The Super Wealthy and Where they Put their Funds
body:
A lot of us have this dream of staying in a house full of money because we are rich, or a poll of money so we can flaunt it to the world, or eating on gold platted table as well as drinking champagne from the finest bottles every day. We see the rich live their lives and then we ask, where do this people keep their money and how do they utilize it.

When it comes to High Net Worth (NTW) classes, the figures matter a lot. The numbers of zeros as well as commas matter a lot and this people instead of handling their finance themselves, get financial banker from banks personally. I was going through my bank and then I realized that there is a special type of cards for high net worth classes as well as they have a different rate when it comes to fees to pay for charges and transactions.

author: mojubare
title: Credit Cards and How to Use it Properly
body:
Have you heard of a credit card, do you even know how it works? I asked a few people in Nigeria if they knew what a credit card was or if they had ever used one and alas, they didn’t have any idea of what a credit card will be explaining what a credit card is and how you can use it properly.

![Credit-Card.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQNc5RPQUBYYzHCuaYLFej9g1qAHMYCJ8QurtV1dNc1Mi/Credit-Card.gif)
[Source](https://www.debt.org/credit/cards/)




A credit card is a plastic card with a chip which is issued by a bank or any other financial institution which allows people use money they do not have currently and pay for it at the end of the month with interest. In simple words, a credit card is a card that allows you borrow money to buy stuffs in form of credits in which you can pay for in the nearest future when the money is available. A lot of people see credit cards as free money and so they misuse the money until when they need to pay the money back.

Credit card companies also give users rewards so t
root_title: Credit Cards and How to Use it Properly

title: Skills will be changing in the nearest future, a future-proof skill is needed
body:
In the past decades, the ability to work became the ability to make money, people were able to earn a very good income by working for or creating a factory. The Industrial age was a very good time for a lot of people and so many people started learning skills related to craft as it became the needed. Time has changed and people now are now in the internet age.

The internet has hanged a lot of things and it has made a lot of people become really employed even in this period of downtime in the economy. A lot of people have become internet oriented and now must deal with skills related to computers, even physical businesses now need the help of the computer to make activities and tasks easier.

Skills have changed currently and the jobs that pay well currently are jobs that people can do remotely or from the comfort of their homes, others are jobs that will be done without stress but rather a proof of brain.

title: Highest Paying CEOs in the Business World
body:
Have you been to large corporations where you see CEOs enjoying the luxury of being one? I was at a company a few years ago and I realized that the CEO of the company had a special car park, a private elevator, and a wonderful office with a nice view. It is no doubt that CEOs are executive members of the board which attends to the affairs of the company. In so many cases, while some CEO get real good salaries, some do not get much or are even the least paid. An example is such is Larry Page who receives a salary of $1 yearly (although, this is just salary and not shares held in the company). In this post, I will be talking about a few CEOs who get good pay or are the highest paid in the world.

### Shantanu Narayen
Being the current CEO of Adobe, he has been the CEO of Adobe Inc since 2007 till date. He is also the chairman and president of Adobe. He made a total income of $39.1 million in salary and compensation. This is a very good income for a CEO. The company is a fortune 400 company. Shantanu Narayen ha

title: The Amazon Fire Phone that Failed
body:
It is no doubt that most large corporation have one thing in common and that is diversification. Microsoft started as a software company and expanded into other tech aspect like service and mobile phone (the mobile phone was a big failure). Google from a search engine now owns YouTube which competes with other video platforms, android the operating system, and are into service provision. Virgin started as a record but soon expanded into airline and many other things, Tencent being a video game company has diversified into the software tech, social media, and other forms of investment. In this same way has Amazon also diversified from being an online commerce service for books, DVDs, and CDs but soon it expanded, and Kindle was born. In this post, I will be talking about one of Amazons’ diversification that went wrong.


![bezos-fire-phone.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXMGWn8DHUL8UDBPSFgkK4djMPesYRaByjB7rSJYJrEWK/bezos-fire-phone.jpg)
[Credit](https://www.wired.com/2015/01/amazon-fire-phone-always-goi
root_title: The Amazon Fire Phone that Failed

title: Get your business out of the comfort zone: Dare to try harder
body:
I have heard someone say I don’t feel comfortable about it so I am not going to do it and I am like are you serious? There are so many things we do not feel comfortable about that ends up working properly while there are other things we feel very comfortable about that turns out really bad. Is the reason why you have not started that great business idea because you do not feel comfortable about it? Common friends you only have to be certain that you are on the right path, most successful men did not feel comfortable at the beginning.

title: Unemployment and its relationship to increased death rate
body:
Unemployment has been one major problem of several economies and the pandemic has increased the number of unemployment in the world to a level where several governments are scared. Unlike in the past where the government of nations worry about unemployment and everything in between, now it is different; the government now must shuffle within citizen health and unemployment. This year 2020, the government of several countries has spent more money trying to curb the pandemic than any other budget for the year.

title: The future is innovative and so should your skill
body:
The problem with majority of those who acquire skill especially in the region where I come from is they expect that skill they have acquired to carry them through their lifetime, they expect those skills to be all they need forever until there is a sudden technological innovation and those skills appear irrelevant again. Truth is, there is need to always upgrade your skill, I think more than ever covid-19 has taught us life crucial lessons, some of the skills that were highly sought after before are no longer relevant now so there is a need to always upgrade your skill.

title: Getting a loan Safely; The things to consider before getting a loan
body:
Have you borrowed money for business or for personal purpose and feel really committed that your entire activity depends on it? It becomes more dramatic when the loan cannot be paid early thereby increasing the amount to be paid. A lot of people get more loans to pay the previously existing ones. One thing a lot of people do is get into loan without understanding what they are getting into. When a financial company is giving out a loan, it is a form of investment for them and it is left to you to make profit out of whatever you loan you are getting needless to ay that loans can make you lose precious properties.

author: mojubare
title: You can become a controller in the army of your finance
body:
When it comes to finance, a lot of us always feel we cannot explain how we spend our money. It often gets finished before we realize what is going on and when the realize that we have used up all the money we worked for without been able to account for it, sadness fills our heart and we wish we had spent the money in a more appropriate way.

It is usually very easy to spend, there will always be something to buy and with so much attractive advertisement flying all over the place recently, we might just be tempted to get those things we do not want to buy and have regrets about them later on.

Is there really a way to get rid of this spending habit completely and gain full control over our finance again? Yes it is very possible and that is the best way I know that we can use to track our finances and make sure that we do not have regrets after we spend.

![QS5PQ6L35VB3ZH3LQ53FUMXOGA.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmerbBpY4HWPRMDE4WECCydAPK8WXWa6j9kvN6oEPhyLtE/QS5PQ6L35VB3ZH3LQ53FUMXOGA.jpg)

author: mojubare
title: Tax; is it necessary or just Extortion?
body:
It is very rear to live a life without having to hear this word “Tax”, it is quite interesting that in a world full of uncertainties Taxes seem to be something that cannot be erased from the economy, it is a constant in the economy. Everyone seems to be taxed at every level dependent on the type of taxes and taxes seems to be the fuel of every nation causing its growths and its fall. From the Military, Social Amenities, road, schools, emergency services, and other welfare (like the stimulus checks), are being funded with taxpayer’s money which is your money and my money. Do we really need taxes or is it just a way for the government to extort from our hard-earned money since the government can just keep printing more money?


![piggy-bank_shutterstock_71773846.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQVra8s2nTyYrseaXxWK2cGsBeScTgWhAUULQUWxdFkpa/piggy-bank_shutterstock_71773846.jpg)

Taxes are the government salary as we would call it in

author: mojubare
title: Is the Stock Market Overvalued?
body:
A lot of people say that the US stock market is currently overvalued since the US economy is down and the businesses are struggling to stand back to their feet, the stock market keeps climbing the mountain and going high. This is one concern for investors and people who are interested in buying stocks as the stock market looks overvalued. It looks like the government and companies are just pumping money into the stock market to make it look good. Do not forget that the stock market is what people see when they want to buy stocks in a company, it is what gives a public company its valuation. If the stock price of a company is going down, there is a high possibility that the people would believe that the company is not performing well internally.


![insider_tips-spotting_undervalued_stock.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmSUe3RJATT8L9Kv2oAZ1xpxow5oHqAL6LBpsvWiZDXCya/insider_tips-spotting_undervalued_stock.jpg)

root_title: Is the Stock Market Overvalued?

title: Do you think Twitter will be Overtaken or will remain King?
body:
Twitter, originally meant for social networking and communication among friends and people who are in a particular niche, region and place to becoming a voice for everything important, everything worth listening to and now a means of passing information. Twitter has become an online voice to share content, current activity and a place to save past activities.


![twitter-app-icon-ios.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbdh3bzDd2v2FaeVXcNvNoojxoVjJYudM3FqiumTRRenT/twitter-app-icon-ios.jpg)
[Credit](https://techcrunch.com/2019/07/19/twitter-tests-a-new-way-to-label-replies/amp/)

Having 166 daily active users (the population of 3 countries) where a lot of people are addicted to the social network that a day isn’t complete if they do not visit and make a tweet. title: The Banking Business we do not all See and Understand
body:
Like we all say, the bank is a place where we keep valuables safe as well as a place where we keep our money. With this, we can say that the bank was actually created for the people as a financial institution for the people, we can decided not to argue this and argue out rightly but there is a problem; is the bank actually doing us a favor or not?



![bank-growing-money.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVyC95xHxKmeAJCuDn6sSeJM8fBUVyBC4GGkLYLvFqfYe/bank-growing-money.gif)
[Credit](https://money.howstuffworks.com/personal-finance/banking/bank1.htm)

While we are made to believe that the bank is for all of us to keep money and other valuables, the truth remains that the bank’s main goal is the same s every other business, which Is to make profit but unlike regular businesses, the bank still has the ability to print money from nowhere.

author: mojubare
title: Getting Out of Debt and becoming Financially Free
body:
Do you know that a lot of people are in debt, maybe you are also in debt, from credit card debt, student loan, mortgage loan, car loan, etc. Debt can be very emotional with disturbing and distracting thoughts over how and when to pay. A lot of us got into debt because we wanted to live beyond our means or because we were desperately in need of money. Two times to never go into debt is when you are in desperate need of cash and when you want to live beyond your means.


![FLO_debt.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWUZVPz2P4R576RPAjSWEcBDBBPWyFaexQ9WBtPnTT3WP/FLO_debt.png)

body:
Have you heard about the Supreme brand? Okay, I see everyone in my region where this brand a lot, from cap, clothes and many more. Founded by James Jebbia, Supreme has been a global brand in fashion seen with celebrities and influencers.


![Screen_Shot_2020_02_19_at_11.19.21_AM.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmc6umcJ28gKQwAiewa2bu8uWPB332aurHHj6iEK8roeZB/Screen_Shot_2020_02_19_at_11.19.21_AM.jpeg)

Actually, the store was meant to be named Supreme and not the clothing brand since they weren’t the one making the clothes rather, the store was in charge of selling the clothes. author: mojubare
title: Passive Income during this Recession
body:
Before the recession, there had always been a job problem but since the Covid-19 pandemic began and the lockdown initiated, the rate of unemployment has increased. All over the world, the major problem currently is economics majoring on unemployment. The lockdown started and sent everyone home to either become a remote employee or a fully unemployed person. It is no doubt that when there are jobs in a country, the economy will soar high but when there are no jobs, it becomes a problem as people who do not have jobs cannot pay for goods and commodities that they want to buy and when consumers aren’t buying goods, there are no money circulating in the public.

title: Investing for Beginners - The Safest Way to Invest in Stocks
body:
A lot of people have been looking at investing, either because they have been hearing about it from people and financial advisers, or maybe from a random guy on YouTube or Twitter. Everyone wants to invest and make money out of it but let me make something clear here, if you are thinking of putting your money into stocks to buy for a short period of time, then you are not investing rather you are trading. Let me also sound this warning, there is no guarantee that you will make profit when you invest in stocks, you might lose part or all of your money while doing this.

author: mojubare
title: Why You Shouldn't Buy Bankrupted Stocks - (The rise in Hertz and Jcpenney stocks)
body:
Hertz, and JcPenney. This name has rung a lot of bell during this pandemic as the company filed for bankruptcy. It is often usual that when a company goes bankrupt, its stocks drop really down to almost nothing but it hasn’t been so for this two companies. Hertz in the last few days, Hertz rose about 500% while JcMorgan went to about 300% and this is strange.



![town-sign-96612_1920_1.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbD1neUn94dg4Fd8onzUM3zkS7YN7w46mCU11Bt28JP2t/town-sign-96612_1920_1.jpg)
[Source](https://www.benzinga.com/analyst-ratings/analyst-color/20/06/16215290/hertz-chesapeake-energy-leading-the-bankruptcy-bubble)


### Why will this happen
Why will people buy bankrupted companies shares? Is one question but the very way to answer is to look at the trend in the last few days. With no doubt, the increase in the stock prices of the companies is a pump and dump and this can only happen with the support of traders who are looking at making crumbs from a dead asset. 

The stock market is not a playgr

title: Amazon Curtail Customer's Choices - a result of too many demands and back loads caused by the pandemic
body:
Compared to the 1st quarter of 2019, the 1st quarter of 2020 has been different for a lot of companies as they experience an all-time high in demands for their services and goods and one of this company is Amazon. Compared to its 2019 1st quarter sales of $59.7 billion, its 1st quarter of 2020 saw a huge sale of $75.5 billion as there is a huge demand from customers due to the coronavirus pandemic.

author: mojubare
title: Why Anti-Trust Act isn't Breaking Big Tech Companies
body:
It is no news that Amazon, Microsoft, Google, Facebook, Twitter and other big technological corporations have access to a lot of our data and with a lot of new technologies being discovered and innovations built on those technologies, it now looks like they are getting more data than expected. With Artificial intelligence, Amazon’s Alexa now has more data about us than what we think we are sharing, from our meals, time to go to bed and wake, TV series and many more. It now looks like data mining is the new gold mining. This particular bridge into human privacy and selling out of data has called for concern and a lot of people in the public has called for an anti-trust sue. Even though a lot of this companies have been facing legal actions and hearings, because they are really large and are having too much as a company but there is one fact which is “this people are not going anywhere, anytime soon”. 


![1b574bd0-32af-11e8-ac48-10c6fdc22f03.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWsJouHSBzw9Abxw27NqheJ2rqkXx8w

body:
One mistake a lot of startup make is trying to replicate what a big corporation do in their small business but one mistake they make is they forget that big companies have the resources, team, and consumer base. Unlike small companies, big corporations have to create an image for their stakeholders and this requires resources while startups are just on their way to make their first $1 million.

title: The Stock Market and Investing during an Economic Recession
body:
You know, I tell people that not everyone can be a self-employed entrepreneur or business man, some people have to work in companies, and others have to earn using their skills talent and ability while others will have to freelance. The different between any of the groups listed above is the ability to handle money. The ability to understand money, double money and make money work for you is what differentiates the rich from the poor and one way to invest money is in the stock market.


![2020-STOCK-MARKET-CRASH-1-1024x573.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbphiojSejVTSfFsURZhKvMoE8CHQ7AtRCQx76p2HMaJ3/2020-STOCK-MARKET-CRASH-1-1024x573.jpg)

title: The Travel Accommodation Unicorn Company; Airbnb
body:
The days of lodging in hotels are about going into extinction with Airbnb bringing a difference to accommodation for tourist and visitors. In the past, people prefer to lodge in hotels because they wanted something classy and because that was the only way to get a roof over a head when in another place not home but as hotels wanted to improve their star ranks and become world hotel, price began to increase and people became worried about where to stay and how convenient it would be and in this time, Airbnb came to the rescue.

author: mojubare
title: Robotics and Automation taking over Kitchens
body:
A real world without covid-19 is a very busy world where people barely have time for themselves, people move around so much that they barely have time to cook their own meal and there is a constant demand for fast food that contains highly nutritious values. Restaurants exist in different regions of the country but on most occasions we do not have sufficient restaurants to feed the large amount of people that makes demand for quick nutritional foods.

The need to satisfy customer requests for fast and highly nutritional food resulted into having robots cook our meals but before we got to the point where robots could cook our food, we had robots that were made in the form of an arm and could easily flip burgers and other robotic machines that could make good salad bowls.


![YRSYTIRG4NGAZASDY7ZZIZGMEI.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZ7WK4aQcjACdtHgvp6yKABgq49HQ8znobfpZxE3LyXar/YRSYTIRG4NGAZASDY7ZZIZGMEI.jpg)

title: Mistakes To Avoid While Trading Stocks
body:
Investing is stock is very volatile although not as volatile as the cryptocurrency market. It is the most accessible market to the general public provided you have the financial power which can be as low as $1 and a phone. There are several online brokers who handles the buying of stocks for people unlike the days where you have to look for a stockbroker in Wall Street or Silicon Valley. Just because it is easy to access the stock market doesn’t mean it is very easy to invest and get your money back, you can lose part or all of your investment (this has now become a motto for every broker).

author: mojubare
title: Paying Off Loans or Investing - My Stand on the Both
body:
Should debt be paid off or should the money be used to invest? This is one controversial topic among people and different people have their different standpoint and what they believe. In this post, I will be sharing my own standpoint and at the end of the post, you can also share your own views about this in the comment.

![images - 2020-05-13T103347.730.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRj8SaCVC14C3fNPF2XExSHEMYV7vUSca6Tgpcs1bGs2r/images%20-%202020-05-13T103347.730.jpeg)
[Image Source](https://www.financialexpress.com/money/financial-planning-should-you-pay-off-debt-or-invest-heres-what-you-should-do/461836/lite/)


### The Question
A person has $20,000 in cash and has a debt of $20,000 with an annual interest of 6%, will you advise him/her to invest in the stock market for a 10% annual income or pay of their debt?

author: mojubare
title: The Weighted Blanket; Innovation finding solutions to sleeping disorder
body:
The inventor of weighted blanket Keith Zivalich, explained how the idea of a weighted blanket was discovered. He was going on a family vacation when his daughter who was just ten years old at that time, placed a Beanie baby on his shoulders, he immediately felt calm and relaxed, then he had an idea of having a blanket that could provide the same level of calmness for people whenever they wanted to get rest. He immediately planned to call it a beanie blanket, his wife started working on making something similar to his description and he explained that after several attempts of breaking needles, they were able to come up with the first weighted blanket that he called Beanie blanket back then, this happened in the year 1997.



After the successful first stage of invention, Keith’s wife showed the blanket to few of her friend and they said they may probably never use such on their kids, they disregarded the idea but Keith had a neighbour who was a teacher to kids with special needs, she took it to her students
root_title: The Weighted Blanket; Innovation finding solutions to sleeping disorder

title: Requirements to Closing Better Sales Deal
body:
There are three strategies that can make you a sales expert if you work hard at taking the principles seriously.

Carefully place yourself on a level of request rather than on a higher expectant level. In sales, you just have to assume for the few minutes, or hours you have to spend with your client, that you are not the one with power. author: mojubare
title: Analysing the four types of income described by Kiyosaki
body:
Kiyosaki is an amazing author that has several books published in his name, the famous writer of ‘’rich dad, poor dad ‘’ always writes about how to live a life of financial liberty. Today I want to share the types of income described by Kiyosaki with you.

Kiyosaki’s analysis says there are four means of income making: employee income, the self-employed income, business owner income and the investor income.

### The Employee income: 
This method of generating income is the most common type of income strategy that we have, this system provides income on a weekly, monthly or yearly basis for workers from employees. This system has been categorized by Kiyosaki as the most risky form of income strategy, the reason for his decision is not far-fetched, he believes in the fact that the employees could get the income earner fired at any time and this means that the said income earner will have no other source of income until the point when he gets another system that wants to hire the skill he has to offer.


![imag
root_title: Analysing the four types of income described by Kiyosaki

author: mojubare
title: What Do You Say About Technological Singularity
body:
t is recorded that the first human fossil is as old as 66 million years ago which means humans could be dated back to about 66 million years ago with only the option to hunt, eat, sleep and reproduce (You could say this is fun but remember there was no technology). It took humans millions of years to create a tool which was eventually created about 1.76 million years ago by Australopithecus who discovered the Oldowan tools which includes hammerstones, stone cores and sharp stone flakes, in short sentence, humans created tools from carving stones. It took almost another 1 million years for humans to discover fire. Fire was a great achievement for humans and was used on a lot of things including foods. The majority of old technological innovations that humans did were dated back to less than 10,000 years which includes the use of iron, wheels, and carriage. 


![images - 2020-04-19T183209.401.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmePaTGeyiA3EMtuUDtxMnyWGw1KRbWetcKJumBexTckjh/images%20-%202020-04-19T183209.401.

title: Space-Based Solar Power (The Future of Renuable Energy)
body:
Scientist have been trying their best to harness natural renewable energy so we can stop burning fossil fuels and make our earth less polluted and with that, scientist came up with a concept called the Space-based Solar Power (SBSP). Using Silicone to convert the sun ray to electric energy hasn’t really been a very productive one as the solar panels still lose a lot of the sun’s energy to reflection and or heat energy. While a lot of work is being done in getting sun converted on the earth surface, scientists still have a conviction that having a space-based solar farm to collect a large and intense sun in space which will be beamed down to earth. 



![NASA-SPS-ALPHA-concept-by-John-C-Mankins.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdLmgieN4gFK6mTF9wHVfi89fkigeNb1YNcQ1MN1iHBdC/NASA-SPS-ALPHA-concept-by-John-C-Mankins.jpg)

The idea is to capture solar energy from space where the sun never stops
root_title: Space-Based Solar Power (The Future of Renuable Energy)

author: mojubare
title: Gaining Expertise before Starting Your Business
body:
One ability that a small business owner must have is the ability to be tolerant to risk, as necessary as it is to be smart and hardworking, you also need to have one necessary skill of bearing risk. Not every small business owner have their own money and in order to raise a substantial capital for business, some of them go out of their way to borrow money and start businesses. It takes a person who can handle risk to try out something new, to borrow money and know that these ideas will not become a success overnight. It is very necessary to look for ways to minimize risk, as efficient as it is to have the ability to take risk, there should be a limit to the risk taken and the risk should be properly calculated and an intelligent one.


![1_bYQmKVRIsBsYE8ijoZNh0g.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNeuibVqmKJzWYVh1vsqT8FnNuxRBt5JpNDMpYTGy2psB/1_bYQmKVRIsBsYE8ijoZNh0g.jpeg)
[Source](https://medium.com/@TrackTime24/resist-the-superman-entrepreneur-impulse-how-to-hire-outside-expertise-1dc1301ac3be)


It take
root_title: Gaining Expertise before Starting Your Business

author: mojubare
title: A Business Needs a Calm Face And Smile To Stay In Good Shape
body:
If there is one thing I am certain about when it comes to business owners is that, most of them usually get lost/ consumed with the happenings around them that it becomes difficult for them to even smile.
Sometimes, the attitude displayed by some business owners makes it becomes scary for others to go into business. Most local business owners have a constant attitude of nagging about how poor their sales have been and how they are unhappy, but one thing that keeps amazing me is the fact that, no matter how much they complain, they never stop the business, so they complain daily and stick around the business continuously, this makes me ask myself, if this isn’t favorable for them, why don’t they change their line of business or if business is not their thing, why don’t they get employed? (I still do not have an answer to this question, so I would not mind hearing from you).


![1dsp-20160108-people005.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmb3Qm7Bxszodkw6AYk9hG9wSJvBj9TGmC5Hujd73SRDS8/1dsp-20160108-people005.pn

author: mojubare
title: Multi-Level Marketing (MLM) and Network Marketing, is it Worth it?
body:
If you get paid to bring people in under you, it is a pyramid scheme. Someone is getting rich over your short sightedness. You are not an entrepreneur or a business person you are making money by increasing the traffic and most cases increasing the financial purse when the person referred pays a particular amount of money.


![490316629.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUZ5ioD8rhqenztEyZbeT8LKVfNvFXNdhuebLKkCo5sY4/490316629.jpg)
[Source](https://yadayadamarketing.com/gaining-customers/why-mlm-is-a-bad-idea/)

MLM known as Multi-level marketing is a marketing strategy used by companies to get their products sold by non-salaried workers who buy the products with their money and sell the products with the aim climbing a ladder as they get more goods and bring more people in the system. The workers get their earnings from a pyramid or binary compensation commission system. MLM salespeople are to sell the products to end users and also convince them to become a part of the system so they can have down lines.
root_title: Multi-Level Marketing (MLM) and Network Marketing, is it Worth it?

author: mojubare
title: Air-gen; Microbes Producing pure, Renewable, non-polluting and cheap Electricity
body:
Science fiction has made so many things look untrue or unattainable but science has made them a dream come through. With improvement in technological research, nanowire-sprouting bacteria has been able to generate electricity from thin air. You must have heard scientist saying they are working on clean power/electricity for self-sustainable system, if you never thought such a thing could become a reality then welcome to the world of reality.

Microbiologist Darek Lovley and his colleague at the University of Massachusetts Amherst the microbes were able to produce electrical wires which could be used to generate electricity. They called the electrical wires Microbial nanowires and this research created controversies in the science world for a decade. This was proven when Electrical Engineer Jun Yao and microbiologist Darek Lovley from the University of Massachusett confirmed the Air-gen.

>We are literally making electricity out of thin air – Jun Yao


![airgen-electricite.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/
root_title: Air-gen; Microbes Producing pure, Renewable, non-polluting and cheap Electricity

body:

Tasks from helping to solve household needs to manufacturing, robotic nurses, security and so on. With robotics, it can be said that human abilities to focus on other thing have increased while leaving a few to robots to handle. Recently, robotics and artificial intelligence brought about an upgrade in the world of robotics which made robots perform operations as well as think and act like humans and it is certain that in the future, robots and Artificial intelligence will be more beneficial to humans. For this post, I am not talking about the large robots rather, I will be discussing the smaller robots. Robots of about 0.1-10 micrometer called Nanorobots and I will be looking at how they are changing the medical world.

author: mojubare
title: Automation, the Future of Shipping
body:
Let me digress a little from to the coronavirus in china. With the coronavirus pandemic, a lot of people have been worried about how to get goods from China as well as send goods to china via cargo. Analysts have predicted that there might be an economic recession due to the outbreak and the Chinese government in other to set things back to normal have asked citizens to go back to work but yet the economy seems paused. Let’s agree that the citizens decides to go back to work, how many foreign persons will risk their lives on a cargo to get goods from china when there is a possibility that they might contact the virus. This is the point you wish everything can be automated from production to shipping, as well as transporting. With that I guess automated shipping would have been of help to transport goods from china to any other of the world.


![rolls-royce-cargo-ships-624x351.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcFWSDdDHfsf1Qv7MkwwUuJvdFMbdEKPpN7PZUMNvxjNT/rolls-royce-cargo-ships-624x351.jpg)

author: mojubare
title: Who Is An Entrepreneur? (The Characteristics Of A Successful Entrepreneur)
body:
A lot of people want to be an entrepreneur but do not know what an entrepreneur really is. Truthfully entrepreneurs starts new ventures and create new businesses but there is more to just those two about an entrepreneur.

One good attribute entrepreneurs have aside creating new businesses is the ability to communicate the vision of the business to others as well as create a good team around the business. Entrepreneurs have the zeal to succeed and with their team through steam and hard times because they believe in their visions.

author: mojubare
title: Learning About Stocks For Beginners (Simple Beginning)
body:
I have heard a lot of people say they want to invest in stocks but do not know what it is or how to go about it. Investing is a very good, easy but very cautious process and investing in stocks is not a different. I will be doing justice to everything about stocks. For the ease of understanding, I will be sharing this broad topic in segments.

### What is a stock
Stocks are investments that serve as a person's right to a share of ownership in a company. Stocks can mean two different thing depending on the side of the coin you are in. As an investor, stocks are securities that serves/represents a company ownership share in any company, fair enough i guess. As a company, issuing stocks is a ways to raise money for the business to grow, expand and invest while keeping in mind that the company will be paying dividends.

body:

In Business, innovation is a vital tool for growth as well as making investors come in to invest since it is seen as means to exploit a new change or in a different sphere of business. For the creation of a new form of investment opportunity in a business, innovation is very necessary. 

Not until the discovery of the Penicillin mold people were not willing to invest in the medical sectors most especially in the bacterial world. Not until the discovery of bitcoin, nobody was willing to invest in any financial sector except to buy stocks and bonds. The last 20 years has been handled by some dominant forces such as Microsoft, Apple, Google and Facebook as they  were innovative being able to use the internet to create a world and investors were willing to invest their funds in.

author: mojubare
title: Preparation of beans and maize. Popularly known as ewaalagbado in Nigeria.
body:
I know that a lot of recipe might have written about on this platform but prepared beans and maize are different recipe that southern part of our like Michael follow me as I explain way it been done.


 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/6l6r0xw94i.jpg)



* get all the kitchen utensils ready for cooking such pot, spoon, knife, and soon on.


* light your gas, put your pot on the fire and water to the pot. Get your beans that had picked and pour it into the pot.


* after that, please picked up your knifed to slice onoin to the beans on the fire. When that is done allow your bean to be soft. 


* Once that is achieved, add the prepare maize to the beans on fire and allow it to be done also.


* if that is also achieved, let add salt, pepper and other season you want to add to it.


* After some minute, open the cover of the pot and add the palm oil to the beans and maize in the pot. Allow it to stir for some minutes and stir the beans, maize and everything together. Then our popularly knowns ewaalagbado is ready
root_title: Preparation of beans and maize. Popularly known as ewaalagbado in Nigeria.

body:

A few years ago one of the leading company was apparent to evaluate its products and its customer service, the realised that the company was making more profits from the customer care service rather than their products in the only selling their products to their customers service.

 Customer service is a business transaction service between customer and agent this kind of services and not long term. The only reason for such is for a short time the process of transaction.

### COSTUMER CARE

Customer care as an internal relationship between customer and the customer care representative. It goes beyond buying and selling it goes to keepin
